name: Banana Boy (yungcereal)
description:
Made for Godot Game Jam 25. It's my first jam (and first real game), so it might be a bit of a mess! Still, I hope you have fun!

Controls:

WASD - Move

K - Attack

J - Dash

Shift - Strafe

Instructions:

One enemy in each room contains a key. Kill this enemy and collect the key. This will allow you to open the fruit, changing your attack ("you"), and changing the room layout and enemies ("the world"). See how many rooms you can get through!
